text: Tomorrow Could Be... is an EP by Canadian rapper Classified released on June 29, 2018 on Halflife Records.Tomorrow Could Be EP - iTunes It is the prequel to his upcoming album Tomorrow Could Be the Day Things Change.Classified Announces New Single "Cold Love" Featuring Tory Lanez, Available Today 9/14 == Background == After the release of his last project Greatful, Classified had mentioned in an interview with CBC music that it would be his last album, but insisted that he wouldn't retire and continue to make music.Classified says Greatful will be his last album In early 2018, Classified released the first single off the EP "Powerless" in support of Canadian Indigenous Women.Classified Drops ‘Powerless’ Video In Support Of Canadian Indigenous Women The second single "Changes" features Anjulie.Changes - Single Classified & Anjulie The third single "She Ain't Gotta Do Much" was the third and final single release.She Ain't Gotta Do Much - Single All six tracks off the EP had music videos shot and released for them. == Track listing == #"Damn Right" – 3:19 #"Changes" (featuring Anjulie) – 4:18 #"She Ain't Gotta Do Much" – 3:38 #"Powerless" – 4:11 #"Fallen" – 3:38 #"Finish It" – 3:34 == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} == References == Category:2018 EPs Category:Classified (rapper) albums
title: Tomorrow Could Be...
